docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Few people would advocate solving the drug problem by killing addicts. Yet that's the effect of the drug policy now pursued by Mayor Koch and Governor Cuomo. By resisting measures to halt transmission of the AIDS virus among addicts, they are letting the infection spread. That does not eliminate drug abuse, only drug abusers.
